query: SELECT id, conversationId, role, LEFT(content, 300) as content_preview, createdAt FROM chatMessages WHERE conversationId >= 40000 ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 10
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ENKfpgkx2S962Xx.root --database NYSDZ3CUp62WRWmJyXH7Fz --execute SELECT id, conversationId, role, LEFT(content, 300) as content_preview, createdAt FROM chatMessages WHERE conversationId >= 40000 ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 10

rows.content_preview: ネットビジネスで稼げない人は、料理を学ぶべき理由について、3000文字程度の記事を書いてください
